alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; City and Borough of Wrangell; Petersburg Borough; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 3:07PM AKST until March 01 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS FOR THE REST OF THE EVENING FOR MANY AREAS... A storm force low over northern gulf coast continues to send plently of moisture and wind into the panhandle today. Snowfall amounts of 6 to 18 inches have been reported over the northern inner channels and portions of the central inner channels Wednesday morning. Blizzard conditions have diminished at Juneau. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow showers continue. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches expected. * WHERE...Central inner channels. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow is mixing with rain in some areas. reported snow accumulation have been around 6 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Island; City and Borough of Wrangell; Petersburg Borough; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
